subject: Critical security vulnerability found
description: Found a security issue that allows unauthorized access to user data. This needs immediate attention.

subject: Feature request: Multi-language support
description: Our team needs the application to support multiple languages including Spanish, French, and German.

subject: Unable to reset password
description: The password reset link in the email doesn't work. I click it but nothing happens.

subject: Billing discrepancy in invoice
description: My invoice shows charges that don't match what I was quoted. Need clarification on the pricing.

subject: App freezes when uploading files
description: When I try to upload multiple files simultaneously, the application freezes and becomes unresponsive. Have to force quit.

subject: Login blocked after password change
description: I changed my password successfully but now I can't login with the new password. Getting 'invalid credentials' error.

subject: Error 404 on dashboard page
description: Getting 404 error when trying to access my dashboard. All other pages work fine.

subject: Request refund for unused credits
description: I have $500 in unused credits from last year. Can I get a refund since I'm not using the service anymore?

subject: Suggestion: Add batch operations
description: It would be really helpful to have batch operations for updating multiple records at once instead of editing them one by one.

subject: Data not syncing across devices
description: Changes I make on my desktop don't appear on my mobile device. Seems like sync is broken. Steps to reproduce: 1. Update record on desktop 2. Check mobile 3. Changes not visible.

subject: Two-factor authentication setup help
description: Need assistance setting up 2FA. The QR code won't scan with my authenticator app.

subject: Service outage notification
description: Experiencing complete service outage for the past 2 hours. No access to any features.

subject: Payment method update failed
description: Trying to update my credit card information but keeps failing with 'payment method invalid' error.

subject: Add export to Google Sheets
description: Would be convenient to have direct export to Google Sheets instead of downloading and uploading.

subject: Tooltip shows incorrect information
description: The tooltip on the settings page shows wrong description for the 'Auto-save' option. It describes something else entirely.

subject: Account verification email not arriving
description: Signed up 3 days ago but still haven't received the account verification email. Checked spam folder too.

subject: API connection keeps dropping
description: API connections are unstable and keep dropping every few minutes requiring reconnection.

subject: Subscription upgrade pricing question
description: Want to upgrade from basic to premium plan. Will I be charged pro-rated or full amount?

subject: Request for audit log feature
description: For compliance purposes, we need an audit log showing all changes made to records with timestamps and user info.

subject: Print preview shows garbled text
description: When I try to print, the preview shows garbled characters instead of proper text. Happens only in Firefox browser.
